languages.text: "Ваша Светлость! Помилуйте! Я... я же только вам... по секрету... Виноват, больше не повторится! Правильно вы меня покарали, слова лишнего больше никому не скажу! Не губите!" {n}Не сводя с вас напуганного взгляда, страж пятится прочь. Клеймо болтуна, оставленное вами на его лице, рыдает кровью и марает плиты скалобетона.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ваша Светлость! Помилуйте! Я...я же только вам... по секрету... Виноват, больше не повторится! Правильно вы меня покарали, слова лишнего больше никому не скажу! Не губите!" {n}Не сводя с вас напуганного взгляда, страж пятится прочь. Клеймо болтуна, оставленное вами на его лице, рыдает кровью и марает плиты скалобетона.{/n}

languages.text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Mercy! I... I confided in you and only you... It won't happen again, I swear! You were right to punish me, I won't tell anyone anything I'm not supposed to ever again! Please, spare my life!" {n}He staggers back in terror without taking his eyes off you. The telltale brand you left on his face is crying blood, staining the rockcrete.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость! Помилуйте! Я... я же только вам... по секрету... Виноват, больше не повторится! Правильно вы меня покарали, слова лишнего больше никому не скажу! Не губите!" {n}Не сводя с вас напуганного взгляда, страж пятится прочь. Клеймо болтуна, оставленное вами на его лице, рыдает кровью и марает плиты скалобетона.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Mercy! I... I confided in you, no one but you... It won't happen again, I swear! You were right to punish me, I won't tell anyone anything I'm not supposed to ever again! Please, spare my life!" {n}He staggers back without taking his eyes off you, terrified. The brand you left on his face is crying blood, staining the rockcrete.{/n}

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Mercy! I... I confided in you and only you... It won't happen again, I swear! You were right to punish me, I won't tell anyone anything I'm not supposed to ever again! Please, spare my life!" {n}He staggers back in terror without taking his eyes off you. The telltale brand you left on his face is crying blood, staining the rockcrete.{/n}

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Gnade! Ich ... Ich habe mich Euch anvertraut, nur Euch ... Es wird nie wieder vorkommen, das schwöre ich! Ihr hattet recht, mich zu bestrafen, ich werde nie wieder jemandem etwas sagen, was ich nicht sagen darf! Bitte, verschont mein Leben!" {n}Er taumelt entsetzt zurück, ohne den Blick von dir abzuwenden. Das mal, das du auf seinem Gesicht hinterlassen hast, weint Blut. Es tropft hinab und färbt den Felsbeton rot.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Mercy! I... I confided in you and only you... It won't happen again, I swear! You were right to punish me, I won't tell anyone anything I'm not supposed to ever again! Please, spare my life!" {n}He staggers back in terror without taking his eyes off you. The telltale brand you left on his face is crying blood, staining the rockcrete.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}! Gnade! Ich ... Ich habe mich Euch anvertraut, nur Euch ... Es wird nie wieder vorkommen, das schwöre ich! Ihr hattet recht, mich zu bestrafen, ich werde nie wieder jemandem etwas sagen, was ich nicht sagen darf! Bitte, verschont mein Leben!" {n}Er taumelt entsetzt zurück, ohne den Blick von dir abzuwenden. Das mal, das du auf seinem Gesicht hinterlassen hast, weint Blut. Es tropft hinab und färbt den Felsbeton rot.{/n}

languages.text: « Pitié, Votre Seigneurie ! Je... je ne me suis confié qu'à vous... Je vous promets que ça ne se reproduira plus ! Vous avez eu raison de me punir, je retiendrai la leçon ! Je vous en supplie, ne me tuez pas... » {n}Il recule en chancelant de terreur sans vous quitter du regard. La marque que vous lui avez laissée au visage suinte d'un sang qui tache le rocbéton.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Mercy! I... I confided in you and only you... It won't happen again, I swear! You were right to punish me, I won't tell anyone anything I'm not supposed to ever again! Please, spare my life!" {n}He staggers back in terror without taking his eyes off you. The telltale brand you left on his face is crying blood, staining the rockcrete.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Pitié, Votre Seigneurie ! Je... je ne me suis confié qu'à vous... Je vous promets que ça ne se reproduira plus ! Vous avez eu raison de me punir, je retiendrai la leçon ! Je vous en supplie, ne me tuez pas... » {n}Il recule en chancelant de terreur sans vous quitter du regard. La marque que vous lui avez laissée au visage suinte d'un sang qui tache le rocbéton.{/n}

languages.text: “大人！饶命！这……这件事情我告诉了您，只告诉了您……我发誓，再也不会发生这种事情了！您惩罚得对！我再也不会和别人说不该说的事情了！请您饶了我吧！”{n}他跌跌撞撞地后退，惊恐的目光始终盯着你。你在他脸上留下的疤痕涌出了汩汩鲜血，染红了他脚下的岩凝土。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Mercy! I... I confided in you and only you... It won't happen again, I swear! You were right to punish me, I won't tell anyone anything I'm not supposed to ever again! Please, spare my life!" {n}He staggers back in terror without taking his eyes off you. The telltale brand you left on his face is crying blood, staining the rockcrete.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “大人！饶命！这……这件事情我告诉了您，只告诉了您……我发誓，再也不会发生这种事情了！您惩罚得对！我再也不会和别人说不该说的事情了！请您饶了我吧！”{n}他跌跌撞撞地后退，惊恐的目光始终盯着你。你在他脸上留下的疤痕涌出了汩汩鲜血，染红了他脚下的岩凝土。{/n}

languages.text: 「陛下！御慈悲を！僕は…僕は陛下に、陛下だけに打ち明けます…。もう二度としません、誓いますから！僕を罰して当然です、誰にも、何も、二度と言うつもりはありません！どうか、お助けを！」{n}青年は恐怖であなたから視線を外せぬまま、ふらふらと後ずさる。青年の顔にあなたがつけた密告者の烙印は血を流してロッククレートに染みをつくる。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Mercy! I... I confided in you and only you... It won't happen again, I swear! You were right to punish me, I won't tell anyone anything I'm not supposed to ever again! Please, spare my life!" {n}He staggers back in terror without taking his eyes off you. The telltale brand you left on his face is crying blood, staining the rockcrete.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「陛下！御慈悲を！僕は…僕は陛下に、陛下だけに打ち明けます…。もう二度としません、誓いますから！僕を罰して当然です、誰にも、何も、二度と言うつもりはありません！どうか、お助けを！」{n}青年は恐怖であなたから視線を外せぬまま、ふらふらと後ずさる。青年の顔にあなたがつけた密告者の烙印は血を流してロッククレートに染みをつくる。{/n}

languages.text: «¡{mf|Milord|Milady}! ¡Piedad! Yo... Confié en usted y solo en usted... ¡No volverá a pasar, lo juro! Hizo bien en castigarme, ¡no volveré a contarle a nadie nada que no deba! ¡Por favor, perdonadme la vida!». {n}Se tambalea hacia atrás aterrorizado sin quitarte los ojos de encima. La marca que le dejaste en la cara está sangrando, manchando el rococemento.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Mercy! I... I confided in you and only you... It won't happen again, I swear! You were right to punish me, I won't tell anyone anything I'm not supposed to ever again! Please, spare my life!" {n}He staggers back in terror without taking his eyes off you. The telltale brand you left on his face is crying blood, staining the rockcrete.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «¡{mf|Milord|Milady}!». ¡Piedad! Yo... Confié en usted y solo en usted... ¡No volverá a pasar, lo juro! Hizo bien en castigarme, ¡no volveré a contarle a nadie nada que no deba! ¡Por favor, perdonadme la vida!». {n}Se tambalea hacia atrás aterrorizado sin quitarte los ojos de encima. La marca que le dejaste en la cara está sangrando, manchando el rococemento.{/n}

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri! Merhamet edin! Ben... Ben bunları yalnızca ama yalnızca size söyledim. Bir daha olmayacak, yemin ederim! Beni cezalandırmakta haklıydınız, bir daha boşboğazlık etmeyeceğim! Lütfen canımı bağışlayın!" {n}Gözlerini senden ayırmadan dehşet içinde geriye sendeliyor. Yüzüne işlediğin muhbir damgasından boşalan kan, kayatona bulaşıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}! Mercy! I... I confided in you and only you... It won't happen again, I swear! The telltale brand you left on his face is crying blood, staining the rockcrete.{/n}
